## Marine Voyages

#### This app uses Leaflet, Shinydashboard and the Tidyverse to explore a dataset on marine voyages. The data includes ship type, ship name, speed, origin, dest, date, longitute and latitue among other variables. 

#### The app let's you select a ship type ship name. Once selected, the ship's route is displayed on a map and some basic details about the ship and its voyage are displayed in value boxes.

#### You can explore the app below or open it in a full browser window [here](https://biolight-informatics.shinyapps.io/Marine-travel-routes-app/).
